lead_paragraph: Five middle-age men take to the airwaves weekly for “Live From the Barrage,” a radio show and podcast that covers an eclectic mix of music, sports and typical tavern chatter.

headline.print_headline: Broadcasting Banter From a Bar in a Queens Garage
headline.main: In Queens, Broadcasting Banter From a Bar in a Garage

snippet: Five middle-age men take to the airwaves weekly for “Live From the Barrage,” a radio show and podcast that covers an eclectic mix of music, sports and typical tavern chatter.
abstract: Flushing, Queens, resident John Houlihan has converted his regular Friday night hangouts with three longtime friends into podcast LIve From the Barrage; title refers to garage converted into bar in which podcast hangouts occur; podcast, defined by Queens-style attitude and acerbic wit, has attracted several high-profile guests.
